name: Death Planet
overview: An evil glactic empire has constructed a moon-sized battle station = the Death Planet. Equipped with a giant laser cannon, it has the power to destroy entire planets. The whole galaxy is under threat. But the battle station has a weakness built=in at it’s very core, and this has come to the knowledge of the rebel alliance. A rebel fighter squadron is on a sabotage mission to destroy the Death Planet and restore peace to the galaxy.
